scripts.dev: pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env development && concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install-start: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run start:backend
scripts.start: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run start:backend
scripts.build-install-start: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run start:backend
